name: Green Tea Mojito
description: A refreshing skinny cocktail with antioxidant power.
preparation: Juice lime with 2-in-1 Citrus Press. Place lime juice, mint, and sugar into a pitcher.
Using a muddle-stick, mash until the leaves bruise slightly and the flavours release.
Add rum and tea, and stir well.
Add iceburg cubes and top with club soda.
tips: Elevate the flavours by adding your choice of fresh fruits to the pitcher. Try limes, honey melon, raspberries, strawberries, and even veggies like cucumber or fennel.
Add more club soda to glasses if a lighter drink is desired. Garnish with additional mint leaves and lime slices.
